response.overview: Humans built huge engines on the surface of the earth to find a new home. But the road to the universe is perilous. In order to save earth, young people once again have to step forward to start a race against time for life and death.
response.title: The Wandering Earth II

titles.title: ฝ่ามหันตภัยเพลิงสุริยะ

results.name: The Wandering Earth II - Main Trailer - In Cinemas 27th January
